already_exist.single: {error} Role {role} is already a welcome role!

errors.cannot_add_everyone: {error} You cannot add the `@everyone` role to welcome roles.
errors.disabled: {error} **Welcome roles are't set!** You can set them with: `{prefix}setting joinroles add <role(s)>`

joinroles.title: Welcome Roles
joinroles.footer: These roles will be added when a new user joins the server.

errors.not_exist: {error} **That language isn't avaiable!** See all the languages avaiable with: `{prefix}setting language`

language.title: Language Settings
language.updated: {success} **Language changed!** Now the bot's language for this server is: **{language}**

messages.footer:
You can customize these messages using placeholders.
See them with: {prefix}settings messages placeholders

errors.disabled: {error} **Welcome message isn't set!** You can set it with: `{prefix}settings messages join [welcome message]`

join.text_channel_updated: {success} **Text channel updated!** If `sendInDm` is false, all the new join messages will be sent in that channel.

errors.disabled: {error} **Leave message isn't set!** You can set it with: `{prefix}settings messages leave [leave message]`

leave.text_channel_updated: {success} **Text channel updated!** All the new leave messages will be sent in that channel.

placeholders.footer: You can use these placeholders to customize messages.
placeholders.title: Messages Placeholders

messages.title: Messages

errors.too_long: {error} Prefix can't be longer than {length} characters.

announce.desc: Allows to send a message in all the channels of the server where the bot can write.

ban.desc: Allows you to ban a member.

commands.desc:
Allows you to delete a certain number of bot messages.

Default is 25.

clean.desc:
Allows you to delete a certain number of messages.

Default is 25.

add.desc: Allows you to create a new custom command.

customcommands.desc: Show all custom commands for this server.

remove.desc: Allows you to remove a custom command.

kick.desc: Allows you to kick a member.

mute.desc: Allows you to mute a member.

nickname.desc: Allows you to manage a member's nickname.

now.desc: Allows you to view the song that is being played.

ping.desc: It allows you to control the latency (ping) of the bot.

play.desc:
Allows you to play a song.

You can provide a url or title of the song.

queue.desc: Allows you to view the songs in the queue.

remove.desc: Allows you to remove a song from the queue.

report.desc:
Allows you to report a member.

If you have the necessary permissions, you can set the channel where the reports will be sent.

disable.desc: Allows you to disable the channel dedicated to reports.

set.desc: Allows you to set the channel where the reports will be sent.

settings.desc: Allows you to manage the bot settings.

add.desc: Allows you to add one or more roles to the list of joinroles.

joinroles.desc: Allows you to configure the roles that will be given when a new user joins the server.

remove.desc: Allows you to remove one or more roles from the list of joinroles.

language.desc: Allows you to change the language of the bot.

messages.desc: Allows you to manage the settings for join and leave messages.

channel.desc: Allows you to set or modify the text channel where the join messages will be sent.

join.desc: Allows you to configure the join message.

remove.desc: Allows you to remove the join message.

sendInDm.desc: Allows you to choose whether to send the welcome message in DMs or in a text channel.

channel.desc: Allows you to set or modify the text channel where the leave messages will be sent.

leave.desc: Allows you to configure the leave message.

remove.desc: Allows you to remove the leave message.

placeholders.desc: Shows placeholders that can be used to customize join, leave, and custom commands.

prefix.desc: Allows you to change the bot prefix.

skip.desc:
Allows you to vote to skip the current song.

If you have requested the current song, you can immediately skip without a vote.

summon.desc: Allows you to invoke the bot in the current voice channel.

unban.desc: Allows you to unban a user.

unmute.desc: Allows you to unmute a member.

volume.desc: Allows you to view, raise or lower the volume.

errors.is_bot_command: {error} You cannot overwrite a bot command.

customcommands.title: Custom commands:
customcommands.none: {error} This server doesn't have any custom commands.

errors.bot_missing_permissions: {error} **Missing bot permissions!** To run this command I need these permissions: `{permissions}`.
errors.disabled_command: {error} This command is **disabled** by the bot owner!
errors.missing_permissions: {error} **Missing permissions!** To run this command you need these permissions: `{permissions}`.
errors.owner_only: {error} This command can be **executed only** by the bot owner!

cog.description_not_found: This cog doesn't have a description.
cog.title: {cog_name} Commands

errors.description_not_found: This command doesn't have a description.

footer.bot: You can use {prefix}help [command | category] for more info on a command or a category.
footer.cog: You can use {prefix}help [command] for more info on a command.
footer.group: You can use {prefix}help {command} [subcommand] for more info on a subcommand.

intro.title: Hello there! :wave:
intro.description: I'm Athomos, a multi-purpose bot designed to be easy-to-use and user friendly.
intro.footer: To start using me, do {prefix}help and see all the available commands.

dm.reason:
You were banned from **{server}** by {author}.
Reason: `{reason}`

errors.missing_permissions: {error} You don't have the permissions to ban this member.

errors.too_many_messages: {error} **Too many messages!** Try a lower number. ({limit}/2000)

dm.reason:
You were kicked from **{server}** by {author}.
Reason: `{reason}`

errors.missing_permissions: {error} You don't have the permissions to kick this member.
{error} You don't have the permissions to mute this member.

role.created: The muted role didn't exist or it was deleted.
role.name: Muted

nickname.changed: {success} You changed the nickname of **{user}** to `{nickname}`.

errors.cannot_change_nickname: {error} I can't change the nickname of that member.
errors.missing_permissions: {error} You don't have the permissions to change the nickname to this member.

channel_not_set.full: {error} **Reports channel not set!** You can set it with: `{prefix}report set <channel>`.
channel_not_set.simple: {error} **Reports channel not set!** Contact an administrator to configure it.

set.changed: {success} **Reports channel changed!** All reports will be sent to {channel}.
set.new: {success} **Reports channel configured!** All reports will be sent to {channel}.

errors.missing_permissions: {error} You don't have the permissions to unmute this member.

errors.bot_already_connect: {error} I'm already connected to a voice channel!
errors.user_not_connected: {error} You aren't connected to a voice channel!
errors.same_channel: {error} I'm already connected to that channel!

remove.cannot_remove_other: {error} You can remove only songs requested by you.

skip.already_voted: {error} You have already voted to skip this song
